item.title: 用hugo写blog
item.description: 安装hugo brew install hugo hugo version 新建一个场子 hugo new site fengtianwu.github.io 克隆一个主题 git submodule add https://github.com/theNewDynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke 配置文件中添加主题 echo "theme = 'ananke'" >> hugo.toml 启动服务器, 并根据提示在本地浏览 hugo server -D 贴一篇博文, 并推到github上 hugo new content content/posts/用hugo写blog.md vi content/posts/用hugo写blog.md git add content/posts/用hugo写blog.md git commit git push
